department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: All required supporting documentation and statements of capabilities must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on the 10, February 2023.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement #31026-237199

*Reference: WS3831231620-Doc3835068024*

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** January 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

### Requirements and Options

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) issues this Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the acquisition of Motor-Driven Rotary Tables.

The tables will be delivered in Boucherville, Québec, Canada. The contract includes options for the buyer to purchase additional units within 24 months after the initial delivery.

### Eligible Parties

This tender is limited to eligible parties who hold the exclusive rights to the procurement. 
Contractors must submit all required supporting documentation and statements of capabilities by the deadline listed above.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

Those who wish to submit a proposal should contact Luc Brunet, Procurement Specialist SPAC/PSPC at:

	Email: luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	Phone: N/A
	Fax: N/A 

Proponents can also visit the discovery site for this tender announcement at:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15213020?extsite=MTUyMTMwMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Conclusion

The procurement process for this tender is currently closed.
